find_athlete(search: str, page: int = 1, ordering: str = 'last_name', ascending: bool = True) → lifter_api.utils.types.AthleteList[source]

Search for an athlete.

Parameters

  • search (str) – Search term for athlete; this will be the patient’s name.

  • page (int) – Page number for search. Defaults to 1.

  • ordering (str) – Accepts last_name or first_name on what to order, default to last_name.

  • ascending (bool) – If the search results are ascending or descending, defaults to True.

Raises

NotAllowedError – The ordering was inputted incorrectly.

Returns

Search results of athletes as well as page information.

Return type

AthleteList

get_athlete(athlete_id: str) → lifter_api.utils.types.AthleteDetail | lifter_api.utils.types.DetailResponse[source]

Get information about an athlete.

Parameters

athlete_id (str) – Athlete ID.

Returns

Athlete details including lifts in competitions.

Return type

AthleteDetail | DetailResponse

  • name (str) – The name of the competition.

Lift models.

class lifter_api.mixins.lifts.LiftMixin(url: str, version: str, auth_token: str | None)[source]

Bases: lifter_api.mixins.competitions.CompetitionMixin, lifter_api.mixins.athletes.AthleteMixin

Lift methods.

create_lift(competition_id: str, athlete_id: str, snatch_first: str, snatch_first_weight: int, snatch_second: str, snatch_second_weight: int, snatch_third: str, snatch_third_weight: int, cnj_first: str, cnj_first_weight: int, cnj_second: str, cnj_second_weight: int, cnj_third: str, cnj_third_weight: int, bodyweight: int, weight_category: str, session_number: int, team: str, lottery_number: int) → lifter_api.utils.types.LiftDetail | lifter_api.utils.types.DetailResponse[source]

Create a lift in an existing session.

Parameters

  • competition_id (str) – Competition ID.

  • athlete_id (str) – Athlete ID.

  • snatch_first (str) – Accepts “LIFT”, “NOLIFT”, “DNA”.

  • snatch_first_weight (int) – Weight of the lift.

  • snatch_second (str) – Same as snatch_first.

  • snatch_second_weight (int) – Weight must be same or larger if

  • DNA (previous lift was NOLIFT or even) –

  • is (can be same weight) –

:param : :param and weights are in kilograms.: :param snatch_third: Same idea as snatch_first. :type snatch_third: str :param snatch_third_weight: Same as snatch_second_weight. :type snatch_third_weight: int :param cnj_first: Follow same as snatches. :type cnj_first: str :param cnj_first_weight: Follows as above. :type cnj_first_weight: int :param cnj_second: Follows as above. :type cnj_second: str :param cnj_second_weight: Follows as above. :type cnj_second_weight: int :param cnj_third: Follows as above. :type cnj_third: str :param cnj_third_weight: Follows as above. :type cnj_third_weight: int :param bodyweight: Body weight in kilograms. :type bodyweight: float :param weight_category: Appropriate weight category. :type weight_category: str :param session_number: Session number. :type session_number: int :param team: Team. :type team: str :param lottery_number: Determines lift order. :type lottery_number: int

Raises

NotAllowedError – Status error.

Returns

Information about created lift. Will also return if athlete, session or competition does not exist.

Return type

LiftDetail | DetailResponse
